description: Put position configuration for a given resource.

parameters.name: ResourceIdentifier
parameters.description: Resource identifier used to update the position configuration.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: Resource type of the resource for which you want to update the position configuration.

parameters.name: Solvers
parameters.description: The positioning solvers used to update the position configuration of the resource. SemtechGnss (dict) --- The Semtech GNSS solver configuration object. The status indicating whether the solver is enabled. Whether forward error correction is enabled.

nested_params.name: SemtechGnss
nested_params.description: The Semtech GNSS solver configuration object.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: The status indicating whether the solver is enabled.

nested_params.name: Fec
nested_params.description: Whether forward error correction is enabled.
